description:
Get your groove on out on the slopes in this groovy tie dye printed Ski Full Cushion Over the Calf Socks. Featuring Smartwool’s Indestructawool technology for enhanced durability and 4 Degree elite fit system for a peak-performance fit, plus body-mapped mesh zones for added breathability. And with cushion all-around the foot, it provides all-day comfort that never gives up. Far out!

  • Indestructawool™ technology for enhanced durability
  • 4 Degree™ elite fit system for a dialed-in, performance-oriented fit
  • Shred Shield™ technology reduces wear from toes
  • Wider welt for secure fit and comfort
  • Body-mapped mesh zones for added breathability
name: Smartwool Ski Full Cushion Groovy TieDye Print OTC Socks - Unisex
